level.text: This chapter shall apply to any person operating a motor vehicle in the District of Columbia.
This chapter shall apply to any motor vehicle that is used for personal use.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 14-212 designated subsec. (a); and added subsec. (b).
